00090             function                object_exists( $id )
00091             {
00092                   try
00093                   {
00094                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00095                         
00096                         $Records = $this->GalleryAccess->unsafe_select( $this->GalleryAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00097                         
00098                         return( count( $Records ) === 1 );
00099                   }
00100                   catch( Exception $e )
00101                   {
00102                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00103                   }
00104             }

00128             function                get_by_id( $id )
00129             {
00130                   try
00131                   {
00132                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00133                         
00134                         $Records = $this->GalleryAccess->unsafe_select( $this->GalleryAccess->NativeTable.".id = $id" );
00135                         
00136                         if( count( $Records ) == 0 )
00137                         {
00138                               throw( new Exception( 'Record was not found' ) );
00139                         }
00140                         
00141                         return( $Records[ 0 ] );
00142                   }
00143                   catch( Exception $e )
00144                   {
00145                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00146                   }
00147             }

00171             function                get_gallery_files( $gid )
00172             {
00173                   try
00174                   {
00175                         $gid = $this->Security->get( $gid , 'integer' );
00176                         
00177                         $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $gid , false , 'gallery' , 'file' );
00178                         
00179                         $Ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
00180                         
00181                         if( isset( $Ids[ 0 ] ) )
00182                         {
00183                               return( $this->FileInputAccess->unsafe_select( 'id IN ( '.implode( ',' , $Ids ).' )' ) );
00184                         }
00185                         else
00186                         {
00187                               return( array() );
00188                         }
00189                   }
00190                   catch( Exception $e )
00191                   {
00192                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00193                   }
00194             }

00218             function                attach_file( $gid , $fid )
00219             {
00220                   try
00221                   {
00222                         $gid = $this->Security->get( $gid , 'integer' );
00223                         $fid = $this->Security->get( $fid , 'integer' );
00224 
00225                         $this->Link->create_link( $gid, $fid , 'gallery' , 'file' );
00226                   }
00227                   catch( Exception $e )
00228                   {
00229                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00255             function                detach_file( $gid , $fid )
00256             {
00257                   try
00258                   {
00259                         $gid = $this->Security->get( $gid , 'integer' );
00260                         $fid = $this->Security->get( $fid , 'integer' );
00261 
00262                         $this->Link->delete_link( $gid, $fid , 'gallery' , 'file' );
00263                         
00264                         $FileInputAccess = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00265                         $FileInputAccess->delete( $fid );
00266                   }
00267                   catch( Exception $e )
00268                   {
00269                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
